reviews.review_msg: The class is pretty easy. Show up, and you pass. You just got to pay attention. If you just think this class is super easy and don't pay attention, you may not pass. She makes an effort to help you complete the assignments. She also holds office hours in case you don't complete in class assignments. There's no hw and the it's graded as P/NP only.

she is a nice person, who makes class fun, two assignments in her KPU class and two midterms. ONly one down fall is she does not mark your work on time. Our first assignment was marked last week of class. replies to emails slowly and takes for ev ver to mark. which was the most annoying part.
Best prof , she is amazing teacher as well as very humble person. She is easily accessible after class and understands her students. Extremely fair on marking assignments and mid terms
